title: Several injured in Chaman blast
content:
ISLAMABAD, Aug 10 (APP): At least six people injured in an explosion occurred near Mall road Balochistan Chaman area on Monday.
Security officials said injured were shifted to a nearby hospital, a private channel reported.
An additional contingent of police officials arrived at Mall Road and started investigation.
